cv: "OBJECTIVE: Seeking a position as an Educational Assistant with Montgomery County School System utilizing strong dedication to educational development to assist students throughout session. SUMMARY OF QUALIFICATIONS \xe2\x80\xa2 Over 3 years experience working as an Educational Assistant \xe2\x80\xa2 Track record of assisting teachers in day to day teaching challenges \xe2\x80\xa2 Highly skilled in formulating and promoting a respectful environment \xe2\x80\xa2 Well versed in providing assistance to students with assignments and projects \xe2\x80\xa2 Hands on experience in serving students with disabilities SELECTED ACCOMPLISHMENTS \xe2\x80\xa2 Achieved the 100% pass result of the students of ABC Institute (Class of 2011) by implementing writing skills and techniques \xe2\x80\xa2 Implemented goals, modifications, and adaptations for students \xe2\x80\xa2 Effectively reinforced desired student behaviors as well as skills taught by teachers \xe2\x80\xa2 Modeled in shaping student behaviors WORK EXPERIENCE ABC Institute Tucson, AZ | Mar 2011 Present Educational Assistant \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist teachers will day to day work including developing test papers and marking exams \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist students with assignments and helping develop their writing skills and the ability to figure and correct their own errors \xe2\x80\xa2 Serve as escort to students during activities \xe2\x80\xa2 Provide educational support and behavior management to teachers \xe2\x80\xa2 Supervise students during exams and test Teaching & Mentoring Communities Vincennes, IN | Nov 2010 Mar 2011 Teachers Aide \xe2\x80\xa2 Assisted Teacher in the planning and execution of the classroom program \xe2\x80\xa2 Helped children with self-care and indoor and outdoor learning activities EDUCATION Tucson City College, Tucson, AZ | 2010 Associate of Education Major: Special Education SPECIAL SKILLS \xe2\x80\xa2 Preparation and cleaning of classroom materials \xe2\x80\xa2 Bilingual: Superb written and verbal communication skills in English and Spanish \xe2\x80\xa2 Demonstrated poise and comfort working with students with different backgrounds"
